item.title: Joshua add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "We are our own dragons as well as our own heroes, and we have to rescue ourselves from ourselves." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Our lives are not as limited as we think they are; the world is a wonderfully weird place; consensual reality is significantly flawed; no institution can be trusted, but love does work; all things are possible; and we all could be happy and fulfilled if we only had the guts to be truly free and the wisdom to shrink our egos and quit taking ourselves so damn seriously." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "THE EDGE, there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Mos Def
item.description: "We blasted holes in the night until she bled sunshine" -- Mos Def
